response.original_title: Las frases de las historias que escribo
response.overview: Night of San Juan at the end of the 90s. Helena and Lorenzo spend their last hours together as lovers, since he is married and she has a partner. Between the entrance and the reception of a small hostel, we will see how their relationship will end, and we will witness their pain and confusion. This story will link up with others, such as that of Óscar, a taxi driver who takes them to the hostel; that of Nicolás, the receptionist, and Yumilis; and that of Flauti and Javi, Nicolás's co-workers. After breaking up with Lorenzo, Helena wanders down the streets of Madrid, where she will receive a mysterious and empowering message, which will make her see that she has an exciting life ahead of her in the diverse and multicultural Madrid.
response.title: Phrases of My Stories
